text:
Melaksanakan tugas dari kantor ke Manado, dan menginap di hotel ini selama 3 malam. Belum pernah ke Manado sebelumnya, membuat saya memilih hotel dengan reputasi yang baik yang saya tahu selama ini, dan pilihan saya sepertinya tepat.

Hotel berlokasi di tengah kota Manado, dekat dengan banyak toko, tempat makan, dan tempat berolahraga (lapangan), sangat nyaman untuk sekedar jalan kaki beli makan, jajan, atau berolahraga.

Pada masa pandemi seperti ini, protokol kesehatan dijaga dengan baik. Tamu hotel dites suhu badan ketika masuk, kemudian ketika sarapan juga saya lihat hampir semua memakai masker. Makanan juga tidak mengambil sendiri, namun diambilkan oleh staf restoran. Hal yang baik sehingga tidak ada tamu yang memegang peralatan dan tentunya meminimalkan potensi kontak. Tips saya: bagi yang pertama kali ke Manado, atau yang sudah beberapa kali, silahkan mencoba menu lokal nasi kuning dengan topping yang enak-enak, salah satunya cakalang asap. 

Kamar sangat nyaman, kamar mandi bersih, air hangat tersedia sepanjang waktu, dan lancar. Peralatan mandi juga lengkap. Handuk kualitas baik, diganti setiap hari. Yang harus ditingkatkan mungkin telpon karena telpon di kamar saya menginap agak banyak noise.

Kamar sangat luas, tersedia meja kerja dan sofa. Lampu kamar tidak terlalu terang sehingga mungkin untuk bekerja di malam hari agak kurang nyaman. Bantal tersedia 4 buah untuk kamar double yang saya tinggali sendirian. Ada water heater dan minuman teh, kopi serta freezer kecil.

Colokan listrik khusus untuk tamu hotel tidak ada, saya harus memakai colokan lampu untuk charge laptop di meja kerja dan di dekat tempat tidur. di masa yang sudah sangat internet things, seharusnya dapat disediakan khusus colokan listrik yang memudahkan untuk mengisi ulang HP dan laptop.

Secara umum, tidak ada komplain berarti selama saya tinggal di hotel ini. Semoga semakin terus ditingkatkan kualitas pelayanannya.
title: Manado untuk yang pertama kali

text:
Saya melakukan kesalahan booking tanggal pada travel (yang sebelumnya saya yakin memasukan tanggal yang benar sesuai kebutuhan). Dan, booking tsb diperuntukkan bagi kolega bisnis saya. 

Kemudian saya menghubungi pihak Swiss-Belhotel menyampaikan apakah bisa mengubah tanggal bookingnya, dan oleh bagian reservasi saya mendapatkan penjelasan untuk melaporkan pada travel, nanti pihak travel yang akan membantu mengubahkan. 

Selanjutnya saya melaporkannya pada pihak travel, dan pihak travel menyampaikan bahwa saya tidak dapat mengubahnya karena regulasi yang telah ditetapkan. Pupus sudah harapan untuk dapat mengubahnya. 
Berdasarkan penjelasan dari travel tsb, saya melakukan reservasi ulang melalui travel yang sama, ternyata ketika saya mengetik tanggal booking yang dikehendaki, yang muncul pada resume adalah tanggal untuk keesokan hari dari tanggal yang saya booking. Saya coba beberapa kali, tetap seperti itu munculnya. 

Kemudian saya menghubungi pihak Swiss-Belhotel lagi, dengan maksud untuk melakukan pemesanan langsung, karena saya tidak mau kesalahan yang sama terulang jika saya melanjutkan pemesanan melalui travel. Singkat cerita, ternyata pihak hotel menyampaikan bahwa saya tidak perlu melakukan booking ulang, dan tetap dapat menggunakan booking yang telah dilakukan dengan tidak perlu melakukan pembayaran apapun lagi.  

Sungguh pelayanan yang sangat bagus dan memuaskan, pihak management hotel mampu melakukan penyelesaian dengan cepat dan bijaksana berdasarkan kejadian yang ada.
Terima kasih banyak untuk pelayanan dan bantuannya.

Salam, 
Luci

text:
Saya menginap di hotel ini selama 3 hari 2 malam, memilih hotel ini karena lokasinya di tengah kota. Pada saat datang disambut dengan pihak resepsionis yang ramah dan memberikan informasi yang lengkap mengenai fasilitas hotel. 

Saya booking kamar superior tetapi karena late check in kamar diup-grade ke superior yeaay :), kamar cukup luas, bersih dan nyaman. Kamar madi ada bathtup dan amenities yang cukup lengkap dan tersedia hair dryer. Wastafel ada retakan walaupun air tidak bocor tapi sebaiknya diganti, untuk space sekitar bathup sepertinya kurang mencukupi jadi pada saat saya selesai mandi dengan shower, air akan mengalir ke pinggiran bathup dan turun ke lantai kamar mandi, akan tetapi posisi saluran air tdk dibuat lebih rendah sehingga air tidak mengalir lancar dan meluap ke lantai jadi tiap saya habis mandi kamar mandi banjir. Yang saya suka dari kamarnya space kamar yang cukup luas dan bed dan pillow yang nyaman dan bersih.

Menu breakfast cukup beragam mulai dari menu tradisional dan menu western. Hanya pelayanan staf resto banyak yang harus ditingkatkan. Staff resto kurang cepat tanggap saya sampai dua kali meminta teh kepada staf yang membersihkan meja tidak direspon akhirnya saya ambil sendiri, jika tamu harus mengambil teh dan kopi sendiri seharusnya staff resto menginformasikan letak kopi dan tehnya dan bisa diambil sendiri, mungkin karena staffnya masih training atau bagaimana krn hampir semuanya menggunakan baju putih dan bawahan hitam, padahal jumlah mereka cukup banyak tapi saya merasa seperti tidak dilayani karena staff kurang ramah dan responsif, untuk menu breakfast saya rekomen nasi kuning, bubur manado dan pastrynya.

Lokasi hotel strategis, transportasi umum angkot, taxi tersedia tetapi di depan lobby untuk keluar dari area hotel kurang ramah untuk pejalan kaki sehingga jika saya hanya ingin keluar hotel saya sedikit takut kesenggol mobil yang masuk ke lobby karena tidak tersedia trotoar untuk pejalan kaki. Karena lokasi di tengah kota di depan hotel cukup banyak swalayan dan resto sehingga jika hanya mau makan di resto ataupun belanja seputar hotel cukup banyak dan berjalan kaki saja keluar hotel.

Selain itu, karena ini termasuk corporate hotel, kami selalu mendapatkan layanan antar jemput Bandara, sehingga tidak perlu susah mencari taksi. Untuk keperluan makan, hotel ini termasuk strategis. Jika malas berjalan jauh, cukup ke depan hotel ke KFC atau bisa juga utk in dining room. Sementara untuk keperluan yg lain, anda bisa memilih Indomaret di depan hotel atau Gelael. Hanya sayangnya, untuk keperluan download via wifi dibatasi dengan speed maksimal 60 KB, hehe...

Jika berkunjung ke hotel ini, anda bisa memilih untuk kamar yang menghadap ke jalan, syukur2 berada di lantai atas. Saya kemarin kebetulan berada di lantai 12 dan berhadap langsung ke jalan sehingga saya bisa menikmati view Manado termasuk dengan Jembatan Soekarno-nya.

text: Untuk kesekian kalinya Hotel ini menjadi pilihan saya maupun teman2 bila melakukan perjalanan bisnis hingga liburan di Kota Manado. Hotel yang berada di jalan arteri Kota Manado, jalan akses menuju bandara, dekat dengan pusat pemerintahan dan tidak berada dalam jalur jalan yang macet di Kota manado menjadi alasan utama bagi kami memilih hotel ini. Tentunya soal harga dan layanan hal yang paling prinsip bagi kami dalam memilih hotel. Memasuki hotel ini memang sedikit riskan karena jalan menanjak yang relatif sempit. Begitu pula untuk akses menuju parkir di basement yang memang rada curam untuk menuruninya. Disebelah hotel tersedia tempat parkir pula namun terbuka. Memasuki lobi hotel ini, terdapat wine lounge disebelah kanan dan resepsionis di bagian kiri. Memang tidak terlalu besar namun  cukup nyaman. Kamar hotel ini secara umum bersih begitupula dengan kamar mandi yang juga tersedia bath up. Fasilitas dalam   kamar pun cukup lengkap seperti safety box, pengering rambut dll. Hotel ini juga memiliki tempat hiburan yang memadai seperti lounge, karaoke hingga bar yang berada di basement. Memang tidak terlalu besar namun cukup memadai. Yang menjadi salah satu yang menarik di tempat ini adalah menu sarapan pagi yang variatif. Tersedia makanan lokal seperti Bubur Manado, juga makan nasional dan pastinya makanan internasional padahal kalau ingin menikmati kuliner khas Kota Manado hotel ini dikelilingi nasi kuning khas manado di Komo luar (bisa jalan kaki hanya 3-5 menit dan tersedia di malam hari), Ikan bakar Tude Raja Oci di depan hotel ini, RM khas Minahasa Rajawali persis disebelah kiri hotel ini. Dari hotel ini kita juga mudah mengakses dari Pecinan Kota Manado yang memiliki Klenteng Tua dari abad ke 19 yaitu Ban Hin Kiong. Berjarak tidak lebih dari 3 km dan 10 menit dari hotel dengan mobil. Untuk menuju kawasan perbelanjaan di pinggir laut, seperti Kawasan Megamas dll membutuhkan waktu 20 menit saja. Untuk akses ke bandara membutuhkan waktu 30 - 45 menit normalnya, namun bila berangkat dipagi hari dengan pesawat pertama menuju Jakarta (06.00 Wita) hanya membutuhkan waktu 15 menit menuju bandara. Pantaslah bila hotel ini menjadi pilihan kita untuk menginap di Kota Manado

text: Bangunan hotel terlihat tidak terlalu besar dan megah seperti hotel berbintang lainnya yang berlokasi disepanjang jalan dari arah bandara ke pusat kota. Areal hotel terbatas, sehingga entrance dari jalan ke teras hotel dibuat menanjak, dan arah kebawah menuju tempat parkir di basement. Pelayanan petugas front office cukup ramah dan cepat. Tersedia 4 unit lift yang berfungsi baik, sehingga cukup melayani walau pada jam sibuk pagi hari. Kamar cukup memuaskan dengan fasilitas dan bathroom yang baik. Setiap kamar berjendela dengan view kota dan perumah sekitarnya. Wifi tersedia, namun harus melalui program aplikasi 'google chrome'. Breakfast merupakan hal yang  menonjol dari pelayanan hotel ini. Terletak pada lantai 2, ruangan breakfast tidak terlalu besar, namun sepertinya selalu mampu melayani pengunjung setiap paginya. Hidangan yang tersedia sangat bervariasi. Selama menginap 3 malam, selalu tersedia culiner lokal..'Bubur Manado' yang enak dan tidak membosankan. Juga yoghurt yang selalu saya cari namun tidak selalu tersedia pada tiap hotel. Pastry dan menu breakfast lainnya tersedia sangat bervariasi dan enak. Hot coffe or tea dilayani oleh petugas yang ramah. Selama 3 hari mengikuti kegiatan kantor di hotel ini dengan  lunch yang disediakan hotel, saya dan teman sepakat bahwa kami lebih menikmati breakfast daripada lunch...
title: ..prefer breakfast than lunch..

text: Saya menginap di hotel ini bersama dengan keluarga pada saat persiapan acara pernikahan kakak saya. Letak hotel ini sangat strategis, terletak di jantung kota Manado. Akses untuk menuju ke pusat perbelanjaan seperti Mall dan Swalayan/Minimarket, serta ATM Center cukup mudah di akses hanya dengan sekali naik angkutan umum mikrolet atau jalan kaki sembari santai menikmati keramaian kota ini. Pelayanan sangat baik dan sangat ramah dimulai dari lobby hotel hingga pelayanan di dalam hotel. Fasilitas di dalam kamar hotel-pun tergolong sangat baik. Kamar yang rapih dan bersih, toilet yang nyaman dan bersih, serta terdapat fasilitas koneksi internet WiFi di setiap kamar dan di sekitar kawasan hotel ini yang menjadi hal penting bagi saya agar selalu tetap terhubung dengan internet dan mengerjakan berbagai tugas saya dengan laptop maupun menikmati hiburan dengan perangat tablet. Menu breakfast-pun sangat bervariasi dengan cita rasa lokal khas Manado, seperti Bubur Manado (Tinutuan), Sup Kacang Merah (Brenebon), dan aneka menu lainnya yang dapat menggugah selera. Terdapat juga fasilitas spa, kolam renang, dan gym yang bisa dinikmati secara gratis. Tetapi ada satu hal untuk diperbaiki, saat saya dan keluarga menggunakan fasilitas kolam renang tidak disediakan handuk, dan kami meminta kepada petugas yang berada di depan tempat spa, dan cukup lama dalam menyediakan handuk untuk kami gunakan sekitar setengah jam kemudian baru kami dapatkan. Selebihnya untuk hotel ini pelayanannya sangat memuaskan. :)
title: Hotel Strategis dan Pelayanan Memuaskan! :)

text:
Ini adalah pertama kalinya saya berkunjung ke manado, pada akhir maret 2012 dalam rangka urusan pekerjaan. Sejujurnya relasi kerja saya yg memilih hotel ini, saya hanya dijemput dibandara lalu diantar ke Swiss-bel maleosan ini.

Kesan saya, lobby nya keren, terkesan mewah.

Kamar luas, bersih, nyaman, deluxe room dengan adanya kursi untuk tamu itu luar biasa dan terkesan murah untuk nominal rupiah sebesar itu tapi yg saya peroleh lebih dari ekspektasi yg ada.

Breakfast? Nah ini yg bravo! Saya puas dgn menu yg ada, terbukti dari jumlah porsi makanan yg saya konsumsi saat sarapan sangat banyak! Hahahaha! Namun untuk dekorasi ruang makan, saya kurang nyaman karena terlalu banyak corak di dinding.. tapi itu masalah selera aja sih, mungkin buat orang lain tidak menjadi masalah.

Lokasi saya kurang begitu paham apakah strategis atau tidak karena saya baru pertama kali ke manado dan untuk akomodasi saya selalu diantar supir, jadi tidak bisa menilai dengan baik. 

Overall? 4 bintang untuk Swiss-bel Maleosan Manado. Suatu hari saya akan menginap disini lagi bersama keluarga saya. 

Menyenangkan! :)
title: Menyenangkan! :)

text:
Kesan pertama saat kami tiba di lobi hotel yang saya dapatkan banyak asap. Saya lumayan terkejut mendapati bahwa merokok masih diperbolehkan di lobi hotel cabang internasional. Saya bepergian dengan bayi 4 bulan, ini bukanlah lingkungan yang sehat untuk ditinggali. Proses check-innya cepat dan bell boynya sangat ramah dan efisien. Koper-koper kami diantarkan segera setelah kami tiba di kamar. Kondisi kamarnya mengecewakan. Seprainya tentu belum diganti sebelum kedatangan kami- seprainya kusut dan ada beberapa noda hitam. Kami minta pengurus kamar untuk mengganti dan dilakukan tanpa tunggu lama.

Sayangnya, penggantinya sama saja kotornya. Handuknya dalam kondisi mengenaskan untuk hotel bintang empat. Mereka terlihat abu-abu dan usang, bahkan beberapa noda darah disitu. Jika Anda bisa membawa handuk sendiri, terutama untuk anak-anak/bayi. ACnya tidak menyala di malam pertama. Kami menelepon teknisi beberapa kali tetapi sedikit yang bisa dilakukan malam itu walaupun mereka memperlihatkan kesungguhan mereka untuk menolong. Situasi ini terbalik dengan malam kedua menginapnya kami sehingga kami tidak komplain lebih lanjut. Sepertinya kami menginap di musim pernikahan di Indonesia. Dalam empat malam menginap, banyak anggota keluarga menghadiri pernikahan atau acara spesial.

Ini menyebabkan koridor hotel agak berisik kadang-kadang, dengan orang-orang mempersiapkan diri untuk masuk dan keluar kamar. Staffnya selalu ramah dan mau membantu. Pilihan sarapannya bagus. Lokasi bagus dengan mempertimbangkan kami mengunjungi Manado untuk menghadiri pernikahan keluarga yang rumahnya hanya 3 menit jauhnya. Saya tidak bisa berkomentar lebih objektif atas lokasinya karena selama kami di sana kami banyak diantar oleh keluarga kami jadi sangat tidak merepotkan. Apakah saya akan menginap di Swiss-Belhotel lagi? Ya, dengan reservasi.
title: Baiknya kamar di lakukan peningkatan

text:
Saya minta pindah ke kamar eksekutif dari kamar deluxe dan kamar ini luas sekali. Sangat bagus dan bersih. Ukuran kolam renangnya pas dan ruangan gym-nya kelihatan bagus (saya tidak sempat menggunakan ruang gymnya). Sayangnya air panas di hotel ini tidak cukup panas. Tidak terlalu masalah karena cuaca di sini juga sudah panas, tapi lebih menyenangkan lagi kalau bisa mandi air panas di malam hari. Ada masalah dengan deposit kartu kredit saya, dan saat saya ditelepon kembali (malam sekali sekitar jam 11), bahkan setelah saya check out, manajernya memaksa saya dengan prosesnya. Sayang sekali saya tidak berhasil mendapatkan depositnya kembali. Saya yakin masalahnya ada pada perusahaan kartu kreditnya. Pilihan menu sarapannya banyak. Makanan lokal dan croissant kejunya menakjubkan.

Jika saya harus kembali untuk kunjungan bisnis lainnya ke Manado, sepenuh hati saya akan kembali ke hotel ini, tetapi lebih baik gunakan uang tunai untuk deposit hotel.
title: Sangat bagus!!

owner_response.text:
Dear Blueplanettraveller,

text:
We stayed here for a night after diving at Bunaken island. Service at the frontdesk was prompt and excellent. 

The rooms and bathrooms were spacious and clean, the beds were comfortable. Basic amenities were provided. There was also free WIFI. We checked out the pool - it seemed a little too small, but there was a gym and people were using it. Didn't try the restaurant but the bakery downstairs sells pretty good cheese crackers. The lift can be pretty slow, so do plan to check-out in advance. 

The hotel is located about 30 mins from the airport, very convenient. There is a small supermarket across the road, and an excellent tuna restaurant (called Tuna House) about 10-15mins walk. Affordable pricing and excellent food. About 20 mins walk, there is a famous massage place (Tikala Shiatsu) within the residential estate - this may be a bit tricky to find, ask the locals for directions.
title: Excellent service, good for a transit.

text:
1. My partner arrived one night before me and was given a smoking room (that had the ashtray taken out) when requested a non smoking room. Had to practically fight to get a real non smoking room. 
2. My toilet had a faulty flush button 
3. Car to the airport had been arranged the day before down to the time we wanted to leave. On that day, we had to wait almost 1 hour for the car to show up. Almost missed the flight! 
4. Ordering food at the restaurant took 30 minutes for a lousy sandwich to arrive. And a local tuna dish (cakalang something) took over 45 minutes. 

From the outside, when I first saw it, was a obvious that it was an old building. If I was wrong, well, it looked like an old building. 

The front lobby door is ALWAYS open. The lobby was always hot. And of course the cold air conditioning air goes out the door. Everyone I asked told me that upper management told them to keep the door open at all times. They're being environmentally friendly I guess.... By inviting mosquitos in.
title: What service?

text:
The location is strategic, you can just walk to nearby restaurants like Rajawali (for deep fried gold fish) or Raja Oci (for grilled fish). Also to go to convenient store, just walk across the road. KFC is very nearby as well. 

Service is bad. I arrived at 5PM and the room is not yet ready to check in. I had to wait for 25 mins. When I asked the reception lady, why already so late still not yet ready, she blamed me for not stating in the online booking that I wanted non-smoking room. And she didn't smile at all during the check in. Quite surprising for a Swissbel standard, as I use this chain hotel quite often. 

During waiting for check in, I waited at the cake shop in the hotel. The staff just sit on her chair, she wouldn't ask you to order anything until you ask her for menu book or order something from the display rack. And then you will need to wait for a loooong time before you get your order. Amazing! I had meetings several times in this cake shop, and that's always the case. The klappertart and devil cake are nice, price also not expensive. It's just the service and ignorance that need to be evaluated. 

The breakfast, not so many options, but there is a corner of local North Sulawesi food which is nice. Staff need to refill the empty menu faster. 
I also tried the ala carte dinner at the restaurant. The food is nice! You just need to look for the waiter for the menu, as it might be the culture there that they don't give you the menu book or come to your table when you go there. 

Room is clean and spacious. Good job for housekeeping staff.
title: Nice location, clean, bad service

text:
The hotel is huge and rooms are clean. However, the hallways could use vacuuming or new carpets.

Room is spacious and the beds are superb. Some noise from the hallway during the evening as doors are not particularly sound proof.
Room service works like a charm. They even phoned us to check if we finished our meal before picking up the plates.

Breakfast has a lot of variety, but apart from waffles, white bread, cereal and plain omelets the rest is indonesian style. More healthy alternatives would improve the overall breakfast a lot. Moreover, people are smoking in the breakfast restaurant without any proper ventilation = non-smokers are practically smoking too.

The wifi signal is not reliable throughout the hotel, and the signal is weak in certain parts of the room (at least the one that we stayed in).

Windows could also use an extra cleaning.

Pool was being maintained during our stay.
title: Nice hotel with good service, average breakfast and not so great wifi

text:
One of the first things I noticed was the bed. It was about the most comfortable bed I have found in a hotel.  The view is nice, looking West to the islands.
I am deducting one star for the restaurant, even though I will review it separately, because a hotel needs to have a decent restaurant to be complete.
Another star is lost because the furniture has no drawers or cabinets.  I like to unpack so that when I leave a room my belongings are put away.  This meant I had to put them on shelves that are above eye level (and I am 6 feet tall), becauses that was the only storage offered other than open shelves.
Wifi was free and hassle-free.  
The TV had tons of channels with some good movie channels.
Aside from the two problems I mention above, the room was pretty comfortable.  Every morning I could count on waking up to several Muezzins from nearby, but that didn't bother me all that much. One night there was a very loud party at the KFC across the street, but I never heard any noice from inside the hotel.
I would not stay here again if given a choice, because of the restaurant.  I prefer the Aston down the street.
title: Very comfortable bed, nice view, poor restaurant

text:
Stayed a couple of times from 2009 and recently at 2014 here, sadly always for business. The hotel conveniently locates at Jl. Sudirman, Manado (45-60 minutes drive from airport). There's a supermarket right in front of the hotel, and a fastfood chain (KFC) also a local restaurant with delicious BBQ fish nearby, really helpful if you stays more than 3 days like me. The front office is always a little bit crowded so please wait for your turn (yeah I know some wont even bother with queueing but those who do, I really appreciate it).

The room.
Nice, spacious and modern facilities welcomes you along with bright smiles of the staffs. Well lit bedroom and equipped with comfy bed, a refridgerator, plus a modern TV armed with local and international channels (in my colleague room, the channel list doesn't match with the channel on the TV, but thats just a minor problem).  Personal safe deposit box and tea and coffee making pot in each room.  The bathroom is clean with standard amenities. 

The food.
Breakfast buffet with lots of choices includes local delicacies too, but sadly the coffee is not to good.  The pastries is exceptionally good though. Room service is average qualities. Personally, I prefer to eat at the BBQ Fish Restaurants near the hotel. There's a small bar at the ground floor, they sure know how to make a cappuchino and serves ice cold beer too.

Other facilities.
1. A well equipped gym and a small swimming pool.
2. Excellent and on-time dry cleaning and laundry service is a great plus.
3. Strong wifi in every room (I stayed in various floor here).
4. Shuttle service from the airport.
5. There's non-smoking room too.

Overall I enjoys my stays at this hotel, hope you all will too.  
Another plus is the staffs is always smiling and give huge attention, one of the front officer still remembers me and my phone number.
title: Great Service w/ Smiles

text:
The BEST thing I like about this hotel was the internet connection speed. But else, just so so.

We stayed there for 4 nights. Room was okay. Hospitality is okay. The safety box was error many times. The Tv channel guide was wrong. I ordered dinner almost every evening, and it always took about an hour for the food to be delivered to my room.

Okay, here comes the downside, CLEANLINESS was A MAJOR problem.
Swimming pool was VERY dirty. The view of small dead insects in the pool was such an turned off.

People were smoking outside the restaurant, nearby the elevator, so it is still located inside the building. Since the lobby hotel is just one floor below and has no partition, plus not in an open air, You could smell the smoke in the whole lobby. I mentioned this to a staff, and he said, yes, it was smoking area. Okay, if that was the hotel policy, then I couldn't say much. It's their hotel, not mine.

This hotel is saved by the internet speed, otherwise, I would rate them 1.

For business trip, maybe it's okay. But I can't recommend this hotel for family with children or those who have health problems or allergies.
title: Good internet speed

text:
Swiss-Belhotel is part of a new corridor of modern hotels built on Sudirman Street right on the edge of downtown Manado (and easily accessible to anyplace you want).  The service is friendly, bending over backwards to make your stay enjoyable.  The pool is very small, so don't expect a resort-sized one.  There is a small pastry shop, a bar, and a good-sized restaurant which serves a nice regional Asian buffet for lunch  A la carte features good Indonesian/Asian dishes, including local cuisine, but there are good Western choices, too.
I would also recommend the Noodle Cafe which is just a block away.  It is located on the 2nd floor of the Fiesta mini-market. Very cheap, but good food...and clean.
 There is room for smaller conventions at Swiss BelHotel.  I would rate this a higher 3 star hotel.

text:
Most of the time of my visits to Manado I stayed either in this hotel or Sedona. Overall I choose this better than Sedona.
Price is competitive, as well as Aston and Quality Hotel. Location is good, in the city not far from next-door Aston. Although the street in front is quite busy, but I feel it better than Quality's hectic Boulevard Street feature.
Room is clean and the Deluxe type room is spacious, the bed is comfortable. 
The biggest minus is that the hotel somehow allows people to smoke in the lobby, and since the hotel is often used for meetings, the lobby can actually choked with cigarette smoke. Other small minus is it doesn't provide free internet in the room. But so do most of the hotels in Manado.
Overall, this hotel definitely my choice to stay for business purpose in Manado.
title: Well located hotel with good price

text: Found this by chance as it wasn't in the guidebooks (pretty new).  Very friendly and clean.  Nice room and little pool.  Probably one of the best options if you fancy staying in Manado city before or after diving, as we did.  Cracking iced coffee too!
title: Great hotel in sweaty Manado

text: Stayed here for a stopover on the way to Bunaken.  The service was fantastic, couldnt help us enough.  Good value for a quality hotel.  Highly recommend if you are staying in the area and need a bit of luxury, though for diving I would stay closer to the action :)
title: Quality hotel in Manado

text: We stayed here 1 night before going to Bunaken island the next day.  It's a comfortable spot, definitely a business hotel.  Good option if you're staying in Manado for 1 or 2 nights.  Rooms are a good size, clean and comfortable.  The restaurant was quite good, and breakfast was one of the best we had on our trip.  I would say good value for money if you have a midrange budget and just need a bed, shower and a good meal.
title: Good for midrange budgets

text:
I stayed in Maleosan Manado for 2 nights in November 2008.
The hotel was quite newly opened back then, it's located in strategic area of Manado, and easily accessible. 

Remarkably good service from the start to the end. 
Very nice & polite doorwoman, quick & efficient service at the reception. 
The room I stayed (standard) was very big, modern, and clean. Big TV, and comfortable furnitures (chair, desk, bed, etc). 

Breakfast was good, although it's standard for a 4-star hotel. 
Service at the lobby lounge is also nice. 

Just a little "improvement needed" was about the staff awareness of the hotel service. When I asked waitress at the lobby lounge about internet connection after my arrival, she said that the internet connection was not available yet. 
However, when I was in the room and read the guide, the internet facility was available (on request). I think it's still understandable, as the hotel was newly opened that time, and maybe some staffs were not completely familiar with the available services. 
If the staffs/waiters/waitresses friendliness is combined with full awareness of hotel service, it will be a really perfect service. 

Overall, should I visit Manado again, Maleosan is surely my choice.
title: Excellent hotel in Manado

text:
I stayed here for a long weekend in the middle of a two week business trip. My main reason to come to Manado was to scuba dive here. The first dive resort I had contacted was booked and the second was too expensive. So I opted to stay downtown in this relatively new hotel. While it's been open only about 6 months, they seem to have the bugs mostly worked out. My rate was excellent and I had a large corner room. The amenities were as expected for a 4-star hotel, but maybe more than one would expect in Manado: flat screen TV, in-room wired high speed internet, quiet AC, in-room safe, mini-bar, turndown service, etc. The staff spoke English and was very friendly. There's a small staffed gym and spa on the pool level.

Breakfast buffet was included in my rate, and while not great food, it was satisfying. It's not the most convenient hotel for walking, but a taxi stand across the street will take you anywhere cheaply. The Megamall and other downtown attractions are 5-10 minutes and a Rp20,000 (about US$2) cab fare away.

So if you're going to dive and that's all, you may want to stay at a dive resort outside the town. But if you want to go to downtown attractions such as Raja Sate restaurant or Score billiards/music club, this was a nice good-value hotel.
title: Competent dowtown business hotel

text:
For the second time I stayed at this hotel when I was on duty to Manado.

 Ordered 2 superior deluxe rooms for 6 nights with a special request for a one-floor room, city view, but was given a different floor room and it looks like the room 801 given to me is superior room type while my colleague's room is 608 which is superior deluxe, I only realized after on 5th day stopped by to my colleague's room which is her room more spacious room size, a bit disappointing while the room rates are clearly different.

During the 6 night stay it seemed that the bed linen had never been replaced, it was only tidied up, and the installation of untidy bed linen at the bottom of the bed was always wrinkled, house keeping performance had to be improved.
The air conditioner in my room is too cold I can't turn it down so often every night I just turn off the air conditioner.

Breakfast is okay, only there are lots of guests order at the egg station and the food is delivered to guest table,when restaurant crowded waitress  gave my order to someone else it happened twice, this is not efficient,  just let the guest wait for the order to finish and take it by them self, no need to be delivered. But for fruit and dessert, served on plate in open area, it should be the same as the others. Fruit limited option in plate not everyone likes all fruits on the plate served, like me only like watermelon and pineapple, and 1 portion too little. I always take 2 portion fruit everyday.
The dessert menu and yellow rice are the best.
Restaurant service is good, there is an improvement .

The concierge or guard at the front, please be more friendly to guests, I ordered a blue bird taxi but because it took a long time I canceled the officer complaining to me, unfortunately I forgot his name, even though the taxi didn't get it and didn't go to the hotel either, really not  comfortable guests scolded like this.

The receptionist please pay more attention to guest request and improve the service and friendliness of the staff.

OK for a night.

text:
Our stay at Swiss- Belhotel began with a sleepless night due to a faulty aircon that sounded like a hairdryer on full blast. In the early hours of the morning it went off like a police car with a pulsing blue light - quite frightening really. 
We told management and they said they'd give us another room. Only thing was, we couldn't access it until  mid afternoon and we were heading off for a full day's tour. However they said as long as we were packed they'd transfer our safe deposit contents (money, passports and tickets for next mornings 7am flight)
to the box in the new room.
So we left this task to them as we were being picked up early. 
After a lovely day where we met our sponsor child for the first time in 8 years we arrived back to the hotel and a new upgraded room. 
We were unable to open the safe so called management who sent up a staff member. He couldn't open the safe with his keys and didn't seem to have any contingency plan. After further tries with his keys management was called and he too had no plan of action. We were leaving 4:45am for the airport next morning and it was about 8:30pm. We hadn't had dinner and I was wondering if we'd be stuck here with no passports, money and tickets.
We suggested checking the safe in our previous room. This proved to be empty. By now I was getting pretty anxious and suggested trying to locate the person or persons who'd moved our belongings. This was done and after nearly 2 hours the safe was able to be opened and our stuff was all there. Hurray! 
We decided to go and have dinner at the restaurant only to find that no non alcoholic drink was available apart from Fanta and Coke - no sparking water even and the menu was pretty limited with two items I tried for being unavailable. 
I settled for some spring rolls. They were very oily and almost devoid of filling.
We return to our room and management had sent up a plate of fruit as compensation for our inconvenience (stress) with the safe etcetera.
Sadly our stay at the Swiss Belhotel will be memorable for all the wrong reasons.
title: I don't ever want a repeat of this

This hotel is supposed to be a premier hotel in Manado. First appearance does kinda lend itself toward that but then you walk up to the desk... it all goes out the window. All of the staff at the desk seemed to be on their first day at work. Not good. At 2:30 in the afternoon when I attempted to check in, my room wasn't ready.  Curious? 
The staff hardly spoke or understood English.  Now, I know that usually isn't a hiring criterion but it sure would be nice.  The other hotels in the area have fluent English speakers in all the areas of their hotels.

The restaurant was the same only the service was pitiful.  Some say it's the culture. It might be but again the other hotel that I've stayed at in Manado provided excellent service throughout.

My advice let the Indonesians stay here as they would be comfortable....Westerners not so much.

Just like other Swiss Bel in Bnadung, Bali ... the one in Manado did not disappoint me, and the rate is fairly reasonable for such quality hotel.

The hotel is also at a fairly convenient location with some of the major shopping malls within walking distance of 15 - 25 minutes !
title: A very nice hotel ....

text: Stayed there two nights last February while waiting to board a liveaboard dive boat.  Clean well kept rooms.  Good food, and very nice breakfast buffet.  Had a very good spicy octopus special for dinner one night.  Internet in room was very spotty, so often had to go to the lobby.  Had an excellent, very reasonably priced massage.  Good location, and nice views of the harbor.  Friendly, helpful staff. Used the small, but acceptable fitness room too.
title: Layover stop

text: This hotel serves as a good base for our slow-paced 4 day family trip. A clean and well-maintained hotel with a laid-back atmosphere. Room size was relatively big and the beds were comfortable. I found that the highlight of the room was actually the view, which overlooked the bay with Manado Tua island very visible at the background. Staff were friendly, especially the security. Breakfast had a decent variety to choose from. The Bubur Manado was a good introduction to the city's local cuisine. Saw some guests smoking freely at the lobby on a couple of occasions. Not sure whether this was allowed, but it sure was a minor discomfort for non smokers. The drop off/pick up area at the front lobby was unbelievably small for a hotel of this size. At certain times this caused congestion as cars were lined up all the way to the main entrance. Traffic management within the hotel compound needs to be improved.
title: Enjoyable stay

text:
If you are looking for a base to explore land options around north Sulawesi, this hotel is a very comfortable base to start. 

20 mins from airport and located in the main "hotel" street its location is about as good as any other similar rated hotels. 

Its not the fanciest but the rooms are very comfortable and clean. ( we got a dulux on 8th floor). 

Wat sets it apart from other hotels I had stayed was the friendly staff. It is the land of smiling hotel!  Everyone from front desk to staff we bumped into ard the hotel were always polite and smily. The friendliest bunch were the girls in the Swiss Cafe during breakfast time. They were very efficient and welcoming. Special mentioning of Astrid who goes out of her way to look after us even we were always struggle to meet the 10 am last order!  Thank you. ;)

Other tips for travel around the region
- traffic is horrible around town. Dont attempt to walk around as there isnt much to see and you will fill ur lungs with diesel fume
title: Great location, very friendly staff

text: My wife and two small children stayed in this hotel for two nights on the way to Bunaken.  The rooms are nice and the deluxe had a clean bath.  We found the staff attentive and helpful.  The average level of English is not high, but then again this is not Bali, yet the people generally are very happy and friendly.  The hotel pool is good for laps and the gym was big, clean, but I would have liked to have seen another cross trainer.  The restaurant is pretty good, but do not assume that what you think is a dish, is exactly what you will get (think garlic bread, sweet??).  Saying that, the chefs and waitresses will try and get you what you want, but while we were there we were pleasantly surprised that the manager and the chefs are actually interested in learning about how to cater for their western guests, which is great and motivates us to come back.  I hear it is also the best hotel in Monado, and that is great if they continue to want to learn from their guests.  I particularly remember one hostess, (Andreana?) who seemed particularly professional and helpful. The staff seem notably friendly to families with children which is 90% the most important thing.  Thanks Swiss-Belhotel Maleosan!
title: Very Friendly & Moving in the right direction!

text:
We stayed here during a classic car touring event for two nights. The beds were nice and clean, although we did ask for a single bed but since the hotel was full, we got twin beds instead. It was a smoking room, a bit smelly but not too strong. Breakfast didn't look too appetizing so we skip it. The massage service was pricey but excellent. 

I would recommend you NOT to buy any cakes from the cakeshop. I bought a red velvet cake that looked delicious but was as hard as stone and when I took a bite, instead of cream cheese they used white butter and it was going stale already. The cake was dry and hard and the only thing I could eat from the cake was the cherry on top. My husband finished his klappertaart but just because he was too hungry to complain. He did say that it wasn't as tasty as it looked. I was dissapointed but I didn't go down to the cakeshop to complain as it was already quite late and I was tired. 

I would say that the receptionists and the waiters were rather spacey dan seemed to work in slo-mo mode. It took the girl in the cakeshop almost twenty minutes to ring up my purchase when there was only another customer in the cakeshop. There was only one receptionist while there were four guests wanting to check in. I have to agree that the bellboys and security people were the only ones "alive" in this hotel. The others seemed to be somewhat dazed. 

All in all, a nice place for you if you need only a nice, clean bed to sleep and central location. Don't expect more
title: Okay for sleeping

text:
I have recently stayed in the Swiss Bel Maleosan twice over the past month (4 nights and 10 nights) for work.  The hotel was exactly what I expected for a hotel that could be anywhere in the world.  The staff were all very friendly, right from check-in to the dining room and the bars.  All staff that I had to deal with had a good knowledge of English, which was great (I know no Indonesian).  Both occasions I arrived at around 11am (long before the posted check-in time) and the front desk staff ensured that the room staff cleaned a non-smoking room for me ASAP so that I could go to the room.  Both times I had to wait 20-30 mins for the room to be ready, but I found this acceptable due to my early check in.

I only ate breakfast in the dining room, which had a good selection of Asian foods.  The Western selection was minimal, but I found the food to be good.

I would definitely stay again on any future visits to Manado.
title: Great Local Hotel

text:
Came in with friends and we stayed here for 4 days 3 nights. Picked this hotel for its good location and justified room rate. 

Arrived past midnight, there's no help from anyone on our luggages (well that's okay, everyone probably out of duty). Greeted by sleepy zombie-like front office boys who took forever to check us in. We made reservation and put deposit payment in advance from Jakarta - and there seem to be no trouble, but what took the FO so long, we were confused. 

Receptionist table was slightly at a mess from mugs of coffee & papers lying around. 

We got into smoking room (did specify when make bookings for a non-smoking room). We got into a corner room on 5th floor - which just happened to be located next to mall/station that makes announcement all day ! (we got to hear the sound of lift and endless sound of public announcement from the building/station that's just outside opposite_

AC in room was leaking, so there's water all over the floor when we entered the room. Room is stuffy with leftover smoke-scent. And bath tub drainage wasnt working well (water from shower float and took forever to drain out) 

Room was clean (except for the smoke smell), linen & towels are all up to standard. 

Engineering came about to check the AC about 30 mins later. (we we hoping to be transferred to another room, but was informed earlier that hotel is fully booked) . Engineering couldnt help with the tub, he said he'd send help (the one that never came and we couldnt be bothered cause it's already so late & we're all tired). We waited for close to an hour min for housekeeping to set up extra bed. 

Wi-Fi is available in room, though router wifi is available, connection is rather slow. But okay for a simple email-checking , not for browsing. 

Terrible breakfast in the morning, came in at 6:30 and greeted by an empty piece of paper and a pen. Breakfast set up was a mess, cold milk wasn't cold, bubur manado & other hot dishes weren't hot. There's no glass & mugs for coffee /tea / juice. Servers were either too busy engaging conversations with table next to ours (stewardess & pilots)  or too busy talking among themselves. Other tables was a mess (leftover from prev.guests). But good thing is food station was being refilled periodically

The cook at egg station didnt understand when i requested for 'egg benedict' - though there's a tentcard display on diff style of egg for breakfast that guest can choose from. I settled for simple scrambled. 

Had a very long, too long process of checking out at the end of our stay. Still no one that helped us with the luggages ( we called receptionist for help, waited for 15 mins, and we decided to bring them down on our own) 

Swimming pool was okay for a good short swim. Clean & not very big. 

Security by the entrance was prolly the most friendly staff we ever encountered throughout our visit and stay at the hotel. 

If this were to be a 2-star property, service, quality, hospitality & everything else is understandable. Else, the stay was a total flop.
title: Feels like a 2-star property

text:
My family and I just got back from our short trip from Manado, where we stayed at Swissbel. We arrived at midnight and the check in was fast, got an upgrade to a deluxe room, which was very convenient since we had toddlers with us. The room has a view of Manado bay and the swimming pool. Breakfast was tasty, all the traditional Manadonese breakfast is there. The staff was very friendly, we ask for plates and cutlery, it was delivered very fast. The last night we were there, I was packing until midnight and needed a screwdriver, it was also delivered to me in less than 5 minutes. So hats off to the staff. The location of the hotel is the best. The is a convenient store just opposite the hotel. The is a famous local coffee shop called 'rumah kopi Tikala' just 5 min walk. Try its 'srikaya toast' and creamy coffee. Also not far from there is Ananas restaurant, try their nasi goreng cakalang (fried rice with tuna) and fried bananas with roa(fish) sauce, very spicy though!
All in all we had a great time there.
title: Could not ask for more, best location!

text: 4 stars and 'very good' is a little on the generous side, but 3 and 'average' looks a bit harsh. As a hotel in a less than upscale city, this one doesn't do badly. The rooms are fine and comfortable, if a little dark. The breakfast is ok, but the options are limited. The staff is generally nice, polite, and competent. In comparison to the rather run down environment with crowded messy potholed streets and dangerous sidewalks, the hotel is an oasis of relative perfection.
title: Adequate

text:
Stayed here for 2 nights from 18-20 July 2013 on business trip.  What was good about the hotel is the close proximity to my office and 2 good local restaurants.  

What was bad??  Were given a room on the 6th floor, upon entering the room (at approx. 6pm) I heard loud music either from karaoke/lounge of the hotel or the adjacent building.  Called the front desk to have me switched to another room and was told that all deluxe rooms are fully booked.  However, they did upgrade me to superior rooms on the 8th floor at no charge after several "arguments".

The 8th floor room had a twin bed and quite big compared to other hotels.  Thought everything was ok, but the first night I had to wear double blankets (from the twin beds) and cover my head as the air-con was blowing full speed and could not be turned off. I assumed the air con control was broken and told the front desk to fix it up the next day.

The second night, I entered the room at approx. 12am and the aircon was off -- at this point, again, I thought I would finally get a good night sleep.  NOT!  It was turned on automatically at 1230am, called the guest service (1st call that night) and they turned it off centrally.  I specifically told them to leave it off until I checked out in the morning and surprise suprise it was again turned on at 3am.  Had to wear double blankets and called the guest service for the SECOND time that night to turn it off and it did manage to stay off until morning.  At 6AM, was woken up by a loud music coming from the speaker in the room, called the guest service for the THIRD time and they apologized for playing the "in-house" music too loud.  They turned it off but in 5 mins, it was on again.  At this point, I was already at my wits end and called the guest service  for the FOURTH time to let me sleep peacefully!! Was told by the guest service that the hotel policy requires them to play the "in-house" music everyday at 6am!!

Just a note, I'm an avid traveller for both business and leisure domestically & internationally, have stayed at least at 20-30 different hotels, by far Swissbel Maleosan Manado is the worst. I'd have gotten a much better sleep at a motel.
title: Good location, WORST sleep ever

text: Stayed from 8 - 13 Jul 2013 during my vacation. Centrally located, good local food is just around the corner (Rajawali & Raja Oci). Convenience store is just opposite. Breakfast is good, but for long stay guest may find limited variations (alternate between Nasi Kuning & Nasi Uduk).  Room are OK and clean although showing wear and tear (in particular the bathroom). Free internet is a plus, unfortunate the wifi router in my room is not working.  However, not a problem as other the signals from other rooms can be used.  I have issue with the limited complimentary mineral water (limited to 2 small bottles per day).  However after asking, the duty manager was very helpful to provide additional bottles. Overall quite happy with my stay. I have no problem recommending this hotel to friends.

I booked from Jakarta for a smoking room and reconfirmed by this hotel, but the reception said that all smoking room are occupied. They asked me if I would like to upgrade my room to a junior suite room. I told them that I don't want to spend more money, because it is not my fault. After some arguments, they agreed to upgrade at no extra cost. But when I entered the suite room, I found no ashtray there and I found that it is a non-smoking room with a note of a Rp 500.000,- penalty for smoking.
I called the GRO and asked them for an ashtray, but the said that my room is a non-smoking room. Again, I have to argue with them then finally they agreed to give ashtray and allow me to smoke in that room.
That's all about the problem. Other than that, it's a nice hotel to stay and the staffs are friendly. I will stay at this hotel again on my next visit to manado.

text:
Stayed here for three days and was upgraded to a Deluxe room. 

This hotel is located in downtown and can be a very good base for business and leisure. 

The hotel room was big, the bed was comfy and the design was also nice. On the contrary, I found that the bathroom was very basic, nothing special. To make it worse, there were at least 3 loose items in the bathroom: sink faucet, shower head and over the door towel hook. I had to tigthen the shower head as it was leaking where the shower head connected with the arm. 

Breakfast was just ok. I would highly suggest the hotel take out their dimsums from their list cause they were horrible. The local dish that I tried (yellow rice) was ok. 

In terms of service, the staff were nice and I got no complaints. 

One small uncommon thing: they put an individial wifi router in each room. Not
Sure why and the internet speed was just average. 

Despite the above feedback, I would still rate this hotel with a 4 star for its service, good rate (+upgrade) and location. They need to keep up with the maintenance.
title: Nice bedroom, dislike the bathroom

text:
1. Staff Service
Never found hotel staff so helpful as the people here. Case in point: I was checking out very early in the morning. The night before, I contacted the front desk to settle my bills and to reserve a taxi so I could have a quick getaway in the morning.  

After I completed my business, unexpectedly she asked two questions that blew my mind. The first one was, "It would be too early for you to have breakfast at the hotel. Would you like to have some breakfast prepared for you to bring to the airport?" The second one was, "Would you need a wake up call?"

She already anticipated my needs before I even thought about it!

2. Location
I won't say the location to be the best, but it is quite convenient if you enjoy walking. There are restaurants, a supermarket, and some souvenir stores around the hotel. And it is also within walking distance from the seaside. 

3. Health Facilities
The gym is not as convenient as you would want from a hotel, and the swimming pool is unfortunately not a smoking free area (although the sign says it is, the guests who come there still are left by the staff to smoke freely).  

4. Business Center
When I was there, the business center was not functioning. So if you need to have something printed or copied, you might need to find an outside place to do it. The hotel staff will be willing to recommend a place for you. 

5. Breakfast
The breakfast buffet have a delicious selection of Manadonese dishes, even the locals love to come and have family breakfast there.
title: Best Front Desk Staff Service

text:
I stayed on the second time. First time few years ago, it was good , brand new and clean but this time it is an absolute disaster.   First i was really annoyed that the rate i booked through booking.com site was 100% more expensive than the local rate at the same room  type  ( Deluxe room)  as my Indonesian colleaque who stayed at the same hotel and same room type.    I mean i don't mind if it is a bit more expensive than local rate, but come on !@ - 100% more , that is ridiculous ! 

The disaster begins after the first night, i got a big room  on the 5th floor with queen size bed , and nice small living area but the air con can not be adjusted, and the shower in the room did not work properly - water pressure was really low because the lock knop to switch from tap in the tub to the shower did not lock tight.   And the shower curtain could not prevent the water splash, so the toilet was so flooded everywhere on the floor. 
I complained and try to change a new room after the first night, but then the hotel give me a much smaller room  on the 6th floor as the same room type was fully booked,  which the receptionist claim it was the small room given was the same rate.  I knew it was a lie, as the room is so much smaller with no wifi internet.    And the shower had the same problem, flooding everywhere after the shower.   So i complained, and ask for a new room after the second night, and they promised to give me the same big room i had before, but no i did not get the same big room.  The room is on the 8th floor, well it is not small as the room on the sixth floor i got, but not the same as the first room i got .  The worst thing is the air con is not working properly on the two nights i stayed, and the internet is sucked.   very slow.  I just sick and tired of changing room so i gave up.  

The breakfast room was small so during the morning you will have to compete to get available desk to sit down to eat.  The food was ok, not good and really not much choice for non Indonesian .  So if you are foreigner, don't expect to enjoy food here.

The gym was ok, with sufficient equipment free weights equipment but if you are looking lots of sky walkers, and others, don't expect that.   The carpet was good, and the aircon was not working . They had to keep the door open. 

The staff speak reasonable english but the service level is not international standard.  The hotel facilities maintenance is difinitely a problem.  

If you are looking for a nice comfortale stay, choose other hotels - there are better new hotels to choose from in Manado.  And i don't expect to come back  to this hotel any more in the future.  It is terrible.
title: Dont book this hotel through internet, it is 100% more expensive than local rate

text:
The hotel is modern with a welcoming reception area, decent food and comfortable bedrooms. Unlike other reviews we found the room service very good; quick, fine choice, good service and extra requests such a drinks were met very well.
The gym and pool were welcome aditions to an inner city stay. The Spa was very good and the treatment excellent at very reasonable prices...I would recommend booking a few treatments on offer such as body massage and scrubs. 
Breafast was included in our stay and the buffet offered a wide range of foods to suit all tastes. However, sometimes service for tea and coffee was very slow and sometimes it didn't happen at all. I also noticed that on a few occassion tables were not fully cleared once guests had finished their food and the next guests tables were set to include previous guests handled utensils. However, one morning I noticed the hotel manager at the breakfast service and everything stepped up a peg!!
The bedroom was very comfortable and modern. Housekeeping could have been slightly better as the forgot to leave us any towels and toilet paper a a couple of occasion but once we infomed them of this the imediately rectified it.
I recommend this hotel as a base to travel out of the city but not to those looking for a 'resort' holiday with good restaurants, beeches and wonderfuls on your door step. I would stay at this hotel again if I was passing through Manado but not as a holiday destination.
title: A pleasant hotel with a descent service and friendly staff.

text: The hotel is located downtown Manado, within walking distance of the Museum of the Province of North Sulawesi (Museum Negeri Propinsi Sulawesi Utara). It is a 4-star hotel up to western standards. The personnel were very helpful. We had a prepaid, non-alterable reservation by internet but arrived a day early. The manager on duty was able to resolve this problem, despite the fact we arrived at 9 pm only. After the experiences with various hotels and inns during our 19 day trip from Makassar to Manado it was a real treat to stay at this nice hotel! We were too tired to go to the restaurant for dinner. Instead, we bought two pieces of chocolate cake at their café that looked expensive (and they were!), but they were excellent. Breakfast was buffet style, sumptuous and excellent.
title: A real 4-star hotel

text:
Manado is a typical small but busy Indonesian city which is not adversely affected by Western tourism. The city is near Bunaken Island which is a world class diving area.

The hotel offered good value with a neat well appointed room for the price range. The hotel had a large restaurant with a good range of food on offer. The coffee was nice - which is not a feature of all hotels in Indonesia.

The hotel included a Spa and Gym. The Gym was relatively spacious with good equipment. The Spa offered a full range of massages and treatments - although ask about the best time for peace and quiet - as there can be noise from the nearby aerobics class if timing is not right.

There is a pool area which is pleasant enough for a city-based hotel and a nice escape from the typical air-conditioned hotel environment.

Overall the hotel offered a clean feel and good quality for this affordable price range.
title: Swiss Bel-hotel Manado

text: Overall, my stay at Swiss Bel-Hotel was a good experience, staff were friendly and very helpful (remembered my name on 2nd visit), thanks to Juliana (?) on the front desk, room was clean and beds comfortable, had dinner in resturant with no complaints (wine a little expensive), would certainly be returning
title: Manado Visit

text: As you enter the hotel I was impressed with the design of the foyer and was greeted with a tasty welcome drink while waiting to check-in. The check-in process was smooth. I liked the elevator security feature that required the use of your room card to activate, but they are relatively small so the Bell Hop had to take the luggage up in a separate elevator. The room was spacious and the bed was very comfortable. A large flatscreen TV is provided and the washroom is adequate in size with a shower that provided a nice wide spray with plenty of hot water. The room service menu I found lacking in variety so I did not order anything. The complementary breakfast is located in a beautifully appointed cafe, but quality of the food was only average.
title: nice hotel in a not so nice town

text: Wir haben hier unsere erste Nacht nach einer 34 Stündigen Reise verbracht. Wir konnten hier erstmal die Unannehmlichkeiten der Resie abschütteln bevor wir die Insel erkundeten. text:
Hotels.comにて 宿泊の3.4ヶ月前に予約をし、 予約完了後、すぐに直々にリコンファームのメールがきました。  リクエスト枠に有料を承知で空港への迎えを要していたので。  ホテルからメールがすぐにきたため印象が良かったのですが、 
しかしながら当日は 迎えなし。メールではフライト情報・到着時間を細かく申して 丁寧に応対返信もあったのに。

空港出口のミーティングポイントにて、 たまたま運良く、他のホテルマンが、 自身がお待ちしているお客様を待っているにも関わらず  声かけをしてくださり、個人的に当ホテルに電話をしてくださったお陰で最悪の事態には至りませんでした。

しかし、  その時のマナド到着のフライトはpm11時。 ゲートの周りにあるカフェも受付終了。 仕方がなく わかりやすい場所で待っていて  40〜50分待ちして迎えがきましたが、  その間が 恐怖でした。  ツーリストは消え、迎えの人々も消え、残っているのは ヘビースモーカーの仕事をしていなさそうな男達のみ。  目がラリってるだけなのか  そんな目つきなだけなのか定かではない男が  立ち代わり  タクシー？  と。    最後に最後まで、私にハイエナのように駐車場まで付いてきた人間には恐怖しか感じませんでした。   そのハイエナの目の前で  わざと日本で利用している携帯電話からホテルに電話をし、数分後に迎えがちゃんときたため  危機脱出でしたが、  事前に ホテルと客がメールをしているにもかかわらず  そんな不安な思いを 迎え約束をしていた客にさせるとは有り得ない。

詫びとして、ジュニアスイートだったが、 こちらは 早朝フライトのトランジットなだけだったから  部屋の内容など 悪くても良くても評価は良くなりません。悪いです。

もっと はっきり言うと、こちらのホテルのジュニアスイートが  上のランクなら この部屋を選ばないのを勧めます。  ジュニアスイートならば  フルーツは部屋にあって当たり前。 バスルームのアメニティは 安物だし低レベルのホテルの並みの部屋のアメニティと同様。 枕も使い古されクタクタ。冷蔵庫は壊れかけて機械音が騒音。   バスローブなし、スリッパなし。    
宿泊を今後して  “いい “   と  評価したいのなら  比較対象は 日本の安物のビジネスホテルの料金だけで比較してでしょう。
送迎代を 別料金で客から取るなら 簡単なことなのだから  100%のサービスをしろ！
インドネシアがさらに嫌いになりました。
title: 送迎代を 別料金で客から取るなら その業務をしろ！

text:
2017年ゴールデンウィークに5泊しました。
部屋も広く清潔で 自分がいた8階はwifiの調子も良かったです。何よりも従業員が気持ち良かった。皆親切で丁寧な英語を話します。
レストランの朝食ビュッフェは普通です。昼飯のアラカルトはグリルツナとハンバーガー  sate ayamを食べたけどとても美味しかったです。特にハンバーガーは最高でした。
フィットネスセンターも併設されています。設備は十分なのですが、カーディオマシーンが数台壊れたままのものや筋トレ用のマシーンもメンテナンスが必要なものがあるのですがしばらく放置されているようです。それだけが残念な点です。ただ毎日フィットネスに通ったのですが、インドネシア人とも顔見知りになりジムにいる人はみんな友好的でした。
swiss bel ホテルは他の国にもあるようですが 機会があればまた宿泊してみたいです。
title: おすすめです。

text:
Wir hatten Ende September 2016 eine Übernachtung im Swiss-Belhotel Maleosan in Manado. Die Zimmer waren geräumig und sauber. Das Frühstück hatte eine große Auswahl und war lecker. Da wir am nächsten Morgen nach Gorontalo weiterreisen wollten, erkundigte ich mich an der Rezeption. Dort wurde mir ein Reiseagentur empfohlen zu der man aufgrund der Entfernung vom Hotel ein Taxi nehmen musste.  Dieses wurde vom Hotel vermittelt und war nicht gerade günstig. Obwohl die Dame an der Rezeption uns diese Reiseagentur ausdrücklich für Fahrten nach Gorontalo benannt hatte, konnte man uns dort nicht helfen. Sehr ärgerlich !!! Glücklicherweise hatte ich mir die Visitenkarte des Fahrer, der uns vom Flughafen nach Manado gebracht hatte eingesteckt. Mobil 082191595212 // Hansye Glenny Mokalu. Da wir mehrmals bei unser Reise seine Transportservice nutzten, möchte ich Ihn ausdrücklich als absolut zuverlässigen, freundlichen und fairen Fahrer erwähnen. 
Leider bin ich vom Swiss-Belhotel Maleosan Manado diesbezüglich enttäuscht. Ansonsten ist es eine empfehlenswerte Unterkunft in Manado, auch wenn sie etwas abseits liegt.
title: Großes Hotel mit gutem Frühstück

text:
Dieses Hotel war unser letztes Hotel vor verlassen der Insel. Sehr schön sauber und große Zimmer. Sehr gutes Frühstück und nettes Personal. Zu Fuss lässt sich die Stadt erkunden und die letzten Einkäufe machen. 
Der Spa Bereich ist sehr gut und preislich top!

text:
très bon Hotel, nous avons passez deux fois 24 Heures dans cet Hotel pour un transit et il a été très apprécier.
bien localisé dans le centre, on peut en quelques minutes rejoindre la mer, ou alors prendre un des Taxi bleu qui attendent au pied de l'hôtel.
le personnel est très aimable, serviable et très réactif.
la décoration semble vintage dans cet hôtel, mais le confort est là...
La literie est de bonne qualité, les chambres assez grandes.
la Clim est très puissante mais assez silencieuse.
super débit Wifi dans les chambres, dans le hall et le restaurant.
seul petit bémols si on veut chercher la petite bête: la salles de bains et le SPA.
le SPA surtout aurait besoin d'une nouvelle jeunesse (pas super clean,  ventilation inefficace, forte odeur d'humidité dans les cabines...)
tous ne peut pas se réglé a coup de Clim à fond ...
Petit déjeuner en buffet super copieux la restauration pour le déjeuner et le diner est de très bonne qualité.
méfiance tout de même sur les épices.
quand il indique sur la carte que le plat est épicé, ce n'est pas de la blague !!!
title: bon hôtel étape

Bedienung. Durch Meting Teilnehmer war das Hotel gut ausgelastet. Gegenüber liegt ein FCK Restaurant. Es ist nicht weit bis zu den grossen Mails.

text: Die Zimmer waren nichts besonderes, aber es hatte alles was man brauchte. Es war zudem sauber und geräumig. Wir waren nur eine Nacht da. Die Bäckerei im Hotel bietet viele süsse Köstlichkeiten. In der Bar und auch an der Rezeption wurden wir äusserst freundlich und schnell bedient. Das Frühstücksbuffet war sehr ausgiebig. Es hatte viel Auswahl, indonesische sowie auch europäische Speisen. Für einen Kurzaufenthalt ein gutes Preis/Leistungsverhältnis. Die Lage ist sehr gut, da es nahe zum Markt ist und auch zum alten Teil von Manado. Um das Hotel hat es viele kleine Speiselokale für jedes Budget.
title: Guter Standard und freundliche Bedienung.

text:
Wir waren in diesem Hotel nur für eine Nacht auf unserem Weg durch Indonesien. Der Service war gut, die Zimmer gut ausgestattet und im großen und ganzen sauber. Betten bequem, Wasser, Kaffee und Tee auf dem Zimmer. Gelegentliche Stromausfälle gehören zum Tagesgeschehen in Manado, daher nichts verwunderliches.
Das Frühstück entfällt bei diese Bewertung weil wir bereits um drei Uhr morgens abgereist sind und so keine Möglichkeit hatten dieses zu genießen.
title: Für einen kurzer Stopover gut geeignet

text:
Ich hatte einen deluxe room, der ca. 35 m² hatte, mit Arbeitstisch und Sitzbereich, Fenster nach 2 Seiten, vom einen sah man dann seitlich das etwa 1 km entfernte Meer, ansonsten ist der Ausblick nicht berauschend. Das Hotel wurde erst im Dezember 2008 eröffnet, wirkt aber irgendwie, als ob es bereits 20 Jahre auf dem Buckel hätte. Das liegt vielleicht auch an der weitestgehend dunklen Einrichtung. Auch hat das Bad nur eine Badewanne mit Dusche, alles ist schon ein bißchen abgewohnt. Allerdings habe ich in dem Bett hervorragend geschlafen. Die Auswahl am Frühstücksbuffet ist sehr gut, u.a. das "Bubur Manado", eine würzige Art Porridge. Das einzige Manko ist, dass die angebotenen Säfte von BASF zu sein scheinen, schade darum. Das Schwimmbad im 3. Stock liegt sehr im Schatten und wird sehr stark von Kleinkindern frequentiert, sodass es praktisch nicht möglich war, dort zu schwimmen, als ich dort war.
Freundlicher und bemühter Service, ab und zu mit etwas Sprachproblemen. Die Ausstiegssituation am Eingang ist etwas problematisch, da sich wegen Steilheit und Enge grade mal nur zwei Fahrzeuge gleichzeitig dort aufhalten können.
title: Hotel mit gutem Komfort

owner_response.text:
Sehr geehrte Momtyallgaeu,

Herzliche Grüße von Swiss-Belhotel Maleosan Manado ...

Im Namen der Manado-Team, ich möchte unsere Dankbarkeit Sie in unserem Eigentum geblieben zu haben, zum Ausdruck bringen. wir schätzen, dass Sie uns in Bezug auf unsere Produkte und Dienstleistungen zu bewerten. und zu Ihrer Information haben wir bereits die Planung der Erneuerung Innenausbau wie Re-Malerei der Wand und die Beschaffung neuer Möbel beginnen, tun wir auch Schulungen für alle Mitarbeiter, um ihre Spracherwerb zu erhöhen. Saft über die wir bereits einige frische Säfte, nicht nur das Konzentrat Saft-Art zu Gast Optionen variiert. Und für den Eingang wir schon mehr Sicherheitspersonal zuweisen, um den Verkehr zu organisieren. wir sind für jede positive Rückmeldungen, die nützlich für unsere bessere Verbesserungen in der Zukunft sein könnte, sehr willkommen.

Vielen Dank für Ihre Zeit in Tripadvisor. wir freuen uns, wieder in unser Eigentum begrüßen Sie. einen schönen Tag ...

Mit besten Grüßen,
Thamrin Ase
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Le charme desuet de cet hotel a Manado seduira les amateurs des annees 50 et de son style de mobilier.
Grande et vaste entree, marbre partout, moquette epaisse. 
Le petit dejeuner bien achalande, mets internationaux et locaux
Idealement place en plein coeur de Manado pres de la mer, pres des nonreux centres commerciaux vous serez ravis de cette escale avant le depart pour les Bunakens.
Le point fort de cet hotel c est la Literie. Vous y dormez comme un bb. Calme ideal pour un week end de repos
Personnel aux petits soins, efficace et disponible.
Belle discotheque au sous sol pour terminer votre soiree dans une ambiance sympa. Souvent des orchestres de qualite jouent une musique de qualite.
Excellent point de chute.
title: Visitez Manado en Indonesie

text:
マナドでは割と新しいホテルです。
部屋はやや狭く感じましたが、掃除は行き届いており清潔でした。
プールは子連れで賑わっていました。
以前日本で働いた事のあるというスタッフがいてとても親切でした。
レストランも広くはないので朝食の時間帯は満席でしたが、待つ事はなかったです。
メニューも豊富で味も良かったです。
フロントのスタッフが美人揃いという印象が特に強く残ったホテルです。
title: コンパクトだけど綺麗です

text: Wij verbleven hier 1 nacht op 27 mei 2012 om te wachten op verbinding met vliegtuig. De kamer was erg gehorig, buren die steeds aan de tussendeur rammelden, een badkamer waar we na gebruik van douche in bad, de vloer konden dweilen, dit terwijl toch echt het gordijn in het bad hing, eten in Swiss restaurant slecht en het geluid van de karaoke was ook niet echt goed voor de spijsvertering. Op ochtend van vertrek werd ons gevraagd of alles naar onze zin was geweest en toen wij vertelden over de badkamer, werd lachend gezegd dat dit bij hun bekend was en dat daar een oplossing voor werd gezocht, het kwam niet echt geloofwaardig over, dus voor ons dit hotel nooit meer.
title: Niet voor herhaling vatbaar

text: Séjour de 3 nuits lors d'une réunion de travail, tout était très bien, sauf, comme d'habitude, la température trop fraîche, mais c'est sans espoir, on se croirait aux USA partout ! Chambres vastes, liaison internet filaire rapide et gratuite, bureau pour travailler de taille suffisante, vue sympa, isolation des bruits de la rue OK. petit déjeuner super, avec quelques spécialités locales mais aussi international... Pas très loin de la mer, mais ce n'est sans doute pas à Manado même qu'elle est la plus intéressante, il y a -paraît-il des endroits superbes autour, mais je n'ai pas eu le temps. Une bonne base pour rester à Manado, sinon il y a plusieurs autres possibilités plus romantiques...
title: Très bon hotel

text:
全体として満足しています。

まず予定より早く着いたのですが、受付の方が親切に対応してくれて、アーリーチェックインの対応をしてくれました。
部屋は一番安いスーペリアルームですが清潔でベッドも普通です。
ただ、ホッとシャワーがぬるかったです。

朝食はビュッフェ形式でマナド名物のおかゆなどもあり充実、オムレツも焼いてもらえます。ただ、ジュースが１００％でなく（おそらくネクターのような感じの液体が入っています）あまり美味しくありませんでした。

街のメインストリートから少し離れますが徒歩でも十分行けますので
快適な滞在をされる方にはおススメします。
title: マナドのホテルの中では良いホテルだと思います。

text:
Zum Abschluss unserer Sulawesi-Rundreise verbrachten wir 2 Nächte in dem Hotel.
Wie bereits im Swiss-Belhotel in Palu waren wir sehr zufrieden.  Das Zimmer war ausgezeichnet, das Frühstücksbuffet sehr reichhaltig und das Schwimmen im Pool angenehm. Mit nur ca. 10 Minuten zu Fuß zum Zentrum ist die Lage ebenfalls sehr gut.
title: Sehr empfehlenswert

text:
L'hotel è situato in un posizione scomoda rispetto ai pochi luoghi di interesse turistici che offre la città, tant'è che la gran parte dei clienti dell'hotel sono uomini d'affari indonesiani.
La hall dell'albergo fa grandi pomesse che poi non mantiene all'interno delle camere. E' infatti imponente, maestosa, con marmi ovunque. 
Le camere sono una grande delusione: moquettes vecchia e sporca, bagno non esattamente lindo, asciugamani vecchi e doccia che, grazie alla tenda troppo piccola, allaga completamente il bagno.
La cosa peggiore, però, ci è accaduta alle otto del mattino mentre stavamo ancora dormendo: la governante ci ha svegliato per chiederci se avessimo degli abiti sporchi da lavare.
Quando ci siamo lamentati con la reception se si trattasse di un'iniziativa personale della governante o se fossero ordini della direzione ci è stato confermato che si tratta di una prassi standard dell'hotel. 
L'albergo si è riscattato con la colazione, la migliore della nostra vacanza in Sulawesi: eccellenti soprattutto i dolci locali, ma più trovati così buoni.
Se dovete a tutti i costi pernottare a Manado vi consiglio di dormire in un altro hotel e venire qui a fare solo la colazione.
title: Se proprio non ne potete fare a meno....

text: 整体上来说,这个酒店按照它的价位来说,还是一个很不错的酒店,地理位置也还可以,就是离主要的商业街区远一些(当然,这个城市也没有多大),酒店的早餐也还不错.
title: 不错的酒店
